Taiwan spots more Chinese balloons, says one flew over islandTaiwan's defence ministry said it had detected three more Chinese balloons flying across the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday, and one of those flew over the island, the second day in a row it has reported such activity. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:21:03 GMT GQ4KE3E56JKGZLDYIZS6PTFYLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-spots-more-chinese-balloons-says-one-flew-over-island-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Chinese provinces warn of thick fog, dozens of Shanghai flights delayedExtremely heavy fog in several Chinese provinces on Thursday led to dangerously low visibility, closing highways, delaying flights out of Shanghai and prompting weather forecasters to release a string of warnings and advisories. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 02:17:20 GMT VP3QD7VF4BLDVCYN7VJVTGMHAU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-provinces-warn-thick-fog-dozens-shanghai-flights-delayed-2024-01-04/Bernard Orr世界中国
China's Dec services activity expands at quickest pace in 5 months - Caixin PMIChina's services activity expanded at the fastest pace in five months thanks to a solid rise in new business, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday, lifting the degree of optimism in the sector to a three-month high. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 01:51:20 GMT DDA3F7X4ANILIVIV4AV2HES3GWY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dec-services-activity-expands-quickest-pace-5-months-caixin-pmi-2024-01-04/Reuters市场宏观问题
Taiwan will publish analysis of China's alleged election interference post voteTaiwan is documenting its experiences with China's alleged attempts to interfere in elections next week and will publish its analysis soon after the vote. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 01:17:02 GMT OO6QHUUGAZN3BPDX​​PWDJLYNN54 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-will-publish-analysis-chinas-alleged-election-interference-post-vote-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
China conducts patrols in South China Sea amid ongoing run-insChina's military will conduct routine patrols with its naval and air forces in the South China Sea from Wednesday to Thursday, the military's Southern Theater Command said, as ongoing tensions simmer in the region over disputed territories. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 14:22:24 GMT SYUSAIONMNLLJK26MK34QRYBTA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-conducts-patrols-south-china-sea-amid-ongoing-run-ins-2024-01-03/Reuters世界中国
Russia's Gazprom breaks daily record for gas supply to ChinaRussian energy giant Gazprom said on Wednesday it set a new daily record the previous day for gas supplies to China through the Power of Siberia pipeline.
